channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2023120612
item.description:
Report X-2023120612

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-03T15:12:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-01
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023120612-SequenceEvent: TRAILER ARRIVED FROM HUB, PACKAGE WAS TAKEN OFF TRAILER AS DAMAGED DescribePack: BOTTOM OF BOX WAS WET WITH GRAY PAINT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: AT UNOAD, PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A DAMAGE BIN WITH ABSORBENT PADS UNDERNEATH AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION. X-2023120615-SequenceEvent: TRAILER ARRIVED FROM HUB. PACKAGE WAS WET ON THE BOTTOM, AND TAKEN OFF TRAILER AS DAMAGED. DescribePack: PACKAGE WAS WET, AND UPON INSPECTION, ONE CAN OF PART A LEAKED APPROX. 1 QUART OF URETHANE. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: AT UNOAD, PACKAGE WAS PUTIN A DAMAGE BIN WITH ABSORBENT PADS UNDERNEATH AND WAS BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.
